suggest.meta_keywords: Jekyll Boilerplate, Azion Edge Platform, static site deployment, GitHub integration, custom domain, Ruby on Jekyll, continuous deployment, Edge Application configuration, Azion Marketplace, edge computing
suggest.meta_description: Deploy and manage Jekyll-based sites with the Jekyll Boilerplate on Azion Edge Platform. Includes GitHub integration, custom domains, and easy configuration.

current.meta_description: This template deploys a repository with a project based on Jekyll, a framework written in Ruby, that enables you to create static sites using Markdown and HTML files.
